name: xDrip
tagline: Use your Dexcom G4 with Android, WIRELESSLY!
body: ##### _** Please note this is __NOT__ a product created by or backed by Dexcom, you can check them out [here](http://dexcom.com/) **_ ## xDrip Currently Supports 2 different modes: ### Wirelessly speaking with a Dexcom Share receiver -- OR -- Building your own wireless bridge and skip the receiver altogether *** ### Access your Glucose levels from anywhere! * xDrip is ready to upload your glucose data to any NightScout server for remote monitoring on just about any internet connected device!! Never heard of it? Check out the [Nightscout Home Page](http://nightscout.github.io/) * Android Wear Support through [NightWatch](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/NightWatch/blob/master/README.md) * Homescreen and Lockscreen Widget! *** ## Want to learn more?? Jump on over to the [Wiki](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/xDrip/wiki) for instructions and downloads!! *** ### Stay Up to Date! Follow me on twitter `@StephenIsTaken`, I will let everyone know when updates happen that you should definitely download! Updates will be rolling out fairly frequently as there is lots to do!!! ### Want to help out? AWESOME, let me know, put up some PRS, lets make it awesome! ### Awesome Contributors: (in no particular order, because they are all awesome) * [@tzachi-dar](https://github.com/tzachi-dar) * [@jstevensog](https://github.com/jstevensog) * [@bhandfast](https://github.com/bhandfast) * [@LorelaiL](https://github.com/LorelaiL) * [@syntaxerr66](https://github.com/syntaxerr66) * [@saercnap](https://github.com/saercnap) * [@ktind](https://github.com/ktind) * [Ly](http://youtu.be/YuxCUeJ9xAU) * [Kev](http://circles-of-blue.winchcombe.org/) * [NightScout](https://github.com/nightscout) * Whoever else is supporting this and helping people out!!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
